FuncDef:
The redirect mldp-p2mp-tunnel command redirects the next hop of packets to an LDP P2MP tunnel.
The undo redirect mldp-p2mp-tunnel command cancels the redirection.
By default, redirecting the next hop of packets to an LDP P2MP tunnel is not configured in traffic behavior view.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an LDP P2MP tunnel.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To redirect the next hop of packets to an LDP P2MP tunnel, run the redirect mldp-p2mp-tunnel command. A traffic policy can be used to apply the action to the tunnel.
Precautions
A traffic behavior has only one redirect configuration. To perform a new redirection configuration, delete the existing redirection configuration.
